title: Help Pls
body:
i recently transferred my account from NA to EUNE and when i was buying RP the message appeared
"You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later."

i waited next day and same message appeared. it still happening during third day. 
Can any some one help

Thnx

replies.body:
Since this is an account-specific issue, I recommend reaching out to our specialists by [submitting a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) 

Let me know if you have any questions.
i submitted a day ago and still didn't receive any answer yet. it possible using paypal for my case?
